thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: It took way too long (longer than 5 days if I remember correctly) to get them to review my book. My book was then rejected. The book had some wear on the corners of the front and back covers, plus two "used book" stickers. I then went else where, which will respectfully remain nameless, and they accepted the book the day they received it. I was also paid the same day by nameless company, and received more than I was Quote: d from sellbackyourBook.com. I won't waste my time again by going back to sellbackyourBook.com due to lengthy, poor experience.
